summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no direct mention of Harold E. Ford. The documents primarily concern the Assassination Records Review Board's (ARRB) final determination notifications regarding the release of HSCA (House Select Committee on Assassinations) staff payroll records. These notifications often involve the postponement of Social Security numbers to protect personal privacy. The documents also include payroll records, personnel records, and correspondence related to HSCA staff. The HSCA's request for information from the CIA regarding the criteria for opening a 201 file is also mentioned. Without explicit mentions of Harold E.
